TEXT.FORM: tɕe nɤki kɯki, "waɟɯ ɲɯ-nmu" tu-kɯ-ti tɕe, sɤtɕha ɲɯ-mɯnmu ɲɯ-ŋu, tɕe koŋla ɲɯ-sɤphɤr ʑo kɯ-fse ɲɯ-mɯnmu ɲɯ-ŋu. tɕeri nɯnɯ tɕe tɯ-pɕoʁ chu ʁɟa ʑo ki tu-ste ɲɯ-ŋu. > 光是朝一个方向 tɕe nɤki, 2008 @nian nɯnɯreri iʑora iɕqha, @quanshijie, nɯnɯ sɤtɕha ɯ-ku ʑo ɯ-rmi nɯ-mbri ma, nɯ kɯ-fse ʑo waɟɯ kɯ-wxti nɯ-nmu. tɕe iʑo, @zhongguo @sichuan ɣɯ @wenchuan, woja nɯnɯreri @dizhenzhongxin pjɤ-ŋu, tɕe nɯtɕu stu kɯ-thɯ pjɤ-ŋu ma, nɯnɯ waɟɯ nɯnɯ wuma ʑo pɯ-wxti tɕe, aʑo kɯre kha pɯ-rɤʑi-a, tɕe li pɯ-ngo-a matɕi, 07 @nian ɣɯ, nɤkinɯ iɕqha, 11 @yue 28 @ri, a-@shoushu pɯ-ɕti tɕe, nɯnɯ 08 @nian ɣɯ 5 @yue 12 @hao, nɯnɯreri nɯ-nmu pɯ-ŋu. tɕendɤre wuma ʑo pɯ-sɤɣmu nɤ, wuma pɯ-sɤɣmu tɕe tɕendɤre nɤkinɯ, aʑo kɯre pɯ-rɤʑi-a tɕe, @dangshi χpɤltɕin nɯnɯ snarndi lɤ-ari. tɕe mɯ-pɯ-rɤʑi tɕe, aʑo stɯsti pɯ-ɕti-a tɕe tɕendɤre, ɲɯ-sɤŋo-a tɕe, /tɤ/ tɤ-zgra ci ɣɤʑu tɕe, ɲɯ-ɣɤgɯgɯɣ ʑo kɯ-fse tɕe, tɕe "qale tu-βze ɲɯ-ŋu rca" nɯ-sɯso-t-a ri, "e, nɯ ɲɯ-maʁ", kɯ-maqhu ndɤre, khɯɣɲɟɯ ra ɲɯ-mɯnmu, nɤki, a-@dianshiji ra ɲɯ-ɣɤrchɤrchɤβ ʑo ɲɯ-mɯnmu, khɯɣɲɟɯ @boli nɯra ɲɯ-ɣɤrchɤrchɤβ ʑo "amaŋ, nɯ ku-nɯ-ŋu kɯ?" nɯ-sɯso-t-a. tɕendɤre ri nɯ-sɤŋo-a ri, tɕe kha ɲɯ-mɯnmu wo, ɯkɯki kha ki tu-fse ɲɯ-ŋu. ki tu-fse ɲɯ-ŋu, ki kɯ-fse mɯ́j-fse, tɯ-khɤl? tɕe ki tu-fse ɲɯ-ŋu (145) ɲɯ-mɯnmu. "wo waɟɯ ɲɯ-ŋu" nɯ-sɯso-t-a. tɕeri a-mi mɯ-pɯ-khɯ tɕe, tɯ-phɣo tɤ-ʑa-t-a ri maka mɯ́j-cha-a. tɕe kɯm thɯ-nɯɬoʁ-a ri, atu pɯ-kɯ-ɣe ra /pe/ pɯ-ari-nɯ. tɕendɤre tɤ-ʑɣɤβzɯr-a tɕe a-pɯ-mɤku-nɯ ma tha a-zda saʁjar-a-nɯ tɕe, pɯ-pɯ-mbɯt nɤ, aʑo stɯsti /a-pɯ-nɯ-ɲcar-a/ ma, (206, a-pɯ́-wɣ-nɯ-ɲcar-a) a-zda kɯnɤ /amɤpɯ/ a-mɤ-pɯ-nɯ-saʁjar-a ma" nɯ-sɯso-t-a. tɕendɤre a-zda ra pɯ-nɯɬoʁ-nɯ, pɯ-ari-nɯ ɯ-qhu kóʁmɯz pɯ-ari-a. tɕe aki kɯre pɯ-nɯɬoʁ-i ri tɕe, to-znɯna. to-znɯna tɕe tɕendɤre nɯ ma kɯ-mnu ɲɤ-me tɕe tɕeri, tɕe "waɟɯ ɲɯ-ŋu" ɲɯ-ti-nɯ. wo, tɕe nɯ kóʁmɯz nɤ kɤ-tso-a. tɕendɤre nɤkinɯ, kɯ-maqhu, kɯ-maqhu, aki ri ntsɯ pɯ-rɤʑi-j, khapa ri. ma ɯ-pɕi kɤ-ɕe kɯ-ɤtsɯtsu maŋe ma, nɯra a-pɯ-mbɯt qhe, nɯra tɯʑo ju-kɯ-phɣo ra kɯ-ɤtsɯtsu maŋe. tɕe /ki/ ki kɯ-fse, kha nɯnɯ, ʁɟa ʑo tu-fse ɲɯ-ŋu. (242) kɯɕɯŋgɯ tɕe waɟɯ ɲɯ-nmu tɕe iʑo kɯrɯ kha tɕe, kɯki stukɤr chɯ́-wɣ-lɤt, romɲa ra chɯ́-wɣ-lɤt ra. (250) tɕe nɯnɯ stukɤr nɯ chɯ-χɕoʁ li ɯ-sta lu-rʁe ɲɯ-ŋu" tu-ti-nɯ pɯ-ŋgrɤl. tɕeri nɯ ʁo ɲɯ-maʁ ri, ki tu-fse tɕe @yigefangmian ? tu-fse ɲɯ-ŋu tɕe tɕe, chɯ-chɯ-χɕoʁ tɕe, ta-znɯna tɕe li lu-jɣɤt ɲɯ-ŋu wo. (302). waɟɯ nɯ wuma /sɤnm/ sɤɣmu ma kha ra pjɯ-zɣɤtsɯr cha, tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, nɤkinɯ, zgoku nɯra kɯnɤ pjɯ-zɣɤtsɯr, qhe tɯɲɤt ra pjɯ-sɯɣe cha. tɕendɤre wuma ʑo kɯ-thɯ nɯra rcanɯ, tɕe praʁ nɯra kɯnɤ pjɯ-phɯt ɲɯ-cha nɤ. praʁ ra pjɯ-phɯt qhe maka, tʂu nɯra pjɯ-phɯt. tɯɲɤt ra pjɯ-sɯɣe qhe, sɤ-ŋke ɲɯ-ɣɤme ra ɲɯ-cha. tɕendɤre, nɯ kɯ-fse ɲɯ-ŋu tɕe, nɯnɯ tɕe, sɤtɕha ɲɯ-mɯnmu ɲɯ-ɕti tɕe, sɤ-phɣo maŋe ma "ju-kɯ-phɣo" tu-ti-nɯ ŋu ri, "ŋotɕu a-nɯ-kɯ-phɣo" ɲɯ-ɕti ma (342) sɤtɕha ra tɯtɯrca ɲɯ-mɯnmu ɲɯ-ɕti. qhe tɯrme ju-kɯ-rɟɯɣ nɯra, kɯ-ɤtsɯtsuɤ kɯ-tu maŋe. tɕe nɯnɯ kɯ-fse nɯ /qaɟy/, waɟɯ ɲɯ-ŋu wo. iʑora "waɟɯ" tu-ti-j ŋu tɕe, tɕe tsuku kɯ tɕe, "waɟɯ nɯ khɯna ŋu" tu-ti-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu. "khɯna ŋu" tu-ti-nɯ tɕe, "waɟɯ nɯ-nmu tɕe khɯna ɲɯ-nɤkhɤzŋga tɕe, "tso tsa" ra tu-ti-nɯ ŋu ri, tɤ-mda tɕe ɲɯ-maʁ wo. tɕe nɯ kɯ-fse waɟɯ ɲɯ-ŋu. waɟɯ ɲɯ-nmu, wuma ʑo sɤɣmu nɤ. tɕe aʁɤndɯndɤt ʑo pjɯ-phɯt ŋgrɤl. izɤra kɯra pa-phɯt ndɤre me. kha tɕe pa-phɯt me, kha wuma ʑo mɯ-tɤ-kɯ-pe nɯra, ɯ-ŋgu jɤz mɯ-tɤ-kɯ-pe nɯra pjɯ-phɯt ɲɯ-cha nɤ. tsuku pjɯ-phɯt ɲɯ-cha. aʑo pa-phɯt nɯ pɯ-mto-t-a me, tu-fɕɤt-nɯ ma. tɕe iʑora nɯ ɯ-mɯr nɯnɯ, nɤkinɯ, @qiche ɯ-ŋgɯ ɕ-pɯ-nɯ-rma-j, athi ri, ɕ-pɯ-rma-j pɯ-ra. matɕi tɕe kha /kɤ/ kɤ-rma mɯ́j-sɤnɤz. tɕe nɯ ɯ-qhu tɕe @yigexingqi jamar nɯ, athi @gongzuozhan ri zgɤr pa-thɯ-nɯ qhe, nɯ ɯ-ŋgɯ ri ɕ-pɯ-nɯ-rma-j. ɕ-pɯ-nɯ-rma-j qhe kha ra mɯ-pɯ-rma-j. ɯ-sŋi tɕe mɤ-kɯ-ʁdɯɣ ra sɤz ??? kha jɤ-nɯɣe-j. (500) ɕɤr qhe ɯ-pɕi ɕ-pɯ-rma-j. nɯ kɯ-fse pɯ-ra. >ɯ-pɯ-ɣɤndʐo? nɯsthi pɯ-tʂaʁ. @wuyueshierhao pɯ-ŋu tɕe, nɤki, tɤjpa ra mɯ́j-lɤt, ɕɤr nɯ tɯmɯ ka-lɤt. ɕɤr nɯra tɯmɯ ra ka-lɤt. waɟɯ nɯ-nmu ɯ-raŋ nɯra, tɯmɯ wuma ʑo lɤt ŋgrɤl. nɯ tɕhi tu-fse ŋu mɤxsi ma. tɕe waɟɯ wuma sɤɣmu. tɕe nɯnɯ, @yufang kɤ-βzu ra kɯ-khɯ maŋe.
